org.sakaiproject.content.impl.serialize.impl.conversion

Class ConvertTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.content.impl.serialize.impl.conversion.ConvertTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable, org.sakaiproject.time.api.Time

    public class ConvertTime
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.time.api.Time

    MyTime is an implementation of the Time API Time.

    See Also:

      • ConvertTime

        public ConvertTime(TimeZone zone,
           int year,
           int month,
           int day,
           int hour,
           int minute,
           int second,
           int millisecond)
        construct from individual ints, and the zone.
        Parameters:
        zone - The time zone.
        year - full year (i.e. 1999, 2000)
        month - month in year (1..12)
        day - day in month (1..31)
        hour - hour in day (0..23)
        minuet - minute in hour (0..59)
        second - second in minute (0..59)
        millisecond - millisecond in second (0..999)

      • ConvertTime

        public ConvertTime(TimeZone zone,
           org.sakaiproject.time.api.TimeBreakdown tb)
        construct from time breakdown, and the zone.
        Parameters:
        zone - The time zone.
        tb - The TimeBreakdown with the values.
